text:
Привет,

 

Моля, за издаване на фактура на PPC с данните в приложения файл.

Падеж 13.12.2024

 

С най-добри пожелания,                                                   

Елена Ковачки

Администрация и Бек Офис                                             

Моб: +359 893 659 834                                                                                                                                                

www.tibiel.com <http://www.tibiel.com/>      

ТИБИЕЛ ЕООД    



                                                              

From: Stoyan Vasilev <s.vasilev@tibiel.com> 
Sent: Wednesday, December 11, 2024 9:21 AM
To: Athanasios Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com>; Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com>
Subject: PPC NOV - BTG Charges

 

Dear colleagues, 

 

Attached below you will find the NOV BTG commodity charge (transportation costs) that has to be invoiced to PPC. I have confirmed the amount and Price Per unit from the actual BTG invoice. 

 

	INVOICE format

			
					
No

Description of Goods/Services

Quantity MWh

Price Per unit EUR

Amount EUR

1

Commodity Charge NOV(0.5235BGN/MWh)

34500

0.2676613

€ 9 234.31

					
					
			Total of Invoice

€ 9 234.31

 

 

Kind Regards,

Stoyan Vasilev

Natural Gas & Power Trading Department

Mob: +359 892 340 167

www.tibiel.com/en <http://www.tibiel.com/en> 

Tibiel L.t.d.
